item.description:
A benefit Concert for the First Presbyterian Church or Waltham featuring Dr. Jung Sun Yoon, a classically trained pianist and harpist; Bulent Guneralp, an excellent baratone vocalist, Kim Davidson, a folk singer songwriter along with Aisling Mannion and Ana Sorino Popa.

The concert is at First Prsbyterian Church of Waltham. 34 Alder Street, Waltham, MA I (just off Moody Street - a block from the Firehouse). The suggested Donation is $10. More information can be found at the following website.

http://fpcwaltham.org...
item.name: Eclectic Musical Evening - Classical, Opera, Folk, Spirtuals
